description: Many institutions are sharing images on flickr. I've begun to list a few of them here. If you know of others please bring them to my attention. Many institutions are sharing images on flickr. I've begun to list a few of them here. If you know of others please bring them to my attention. Aerial Photographic Archive for Archaeology in the Middle East flickr Photostream American School of Classical Studies at Athens flickr Photostream The Brooklyn Museum flickr Photostream Centre for Egyptological Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow (CESRAS) and the Russian Institute of Egyptology in Cairo (RIEC) flickr Photostream The Egypt Exploration Society flickr Photostream Institute for the Study of the Ancient World flickr Photostream The Monuments of Syria flickr Photostream The Palestine Exploration Fund flickr Photostream The University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology flickr Photostream.
title: Institutional flickr Photostreams
